message.Title: Waiting Shuttle
message.Content: Message Contetn 1

message.Title: No Error
message.Content: No Error Code Readed

message.Title: N.I.O Rejected
message.Content: 1.-Part Rejected By N.I.O. Command;2.-Check Part

message.Title: Defects detected on bezel, lens, knob or knob cap
message.Content: 1.-Scrap shifter and regain single parts in a special process

message.Title: Defects detected on Toggle switches levers
message.Content: 1.-Remove screw;2.-De-assemble the toggle lever;3.-Place NOK lever into NOK box;4.-Send WPC to cell 850 to reassemble a new lever and place new screw

message.Title: Defects detected on bitron switches or toggle switches
Failure in labeling procedure
message.Content: 1.-Taking away the label and sending the WPC again to the cell for relabeling

message.Title: DMC/Barcode not readable
message.Content: Taking away the label and sending the WPC again to the cell for relabeling

message.Title: Greasing points not placed
message.Content: Clean shaft, Housing and bracket and send back to cell 300 for Re-greasing

message.Content: Clean shaft, Housing and bracket and send back to cell 300 for Re-greasing

message.Title: Air particles detected
message.Content: Clean shaft, Housing and bracket and send back to cell 300 for Re-greasing

message.Title: Parts missing
message.Content: Check Housing , Bracket and Shaft in correct position;then send back to cell 300 for greasing

message.Title: Damage in Component
message.Content: 1:Scrap shaft;2:Clean All the components with grease;3:Send Back components to cell 200

message.Title: Damage in Component
message.Content: Scrap locking element ;Confirm the correct Assy visually and place in WPC;Send back to Cell 350

message.Title: Damage in Component
message.Content: 1:Scrap Sub Assy Bracket;2:Clean All the components with grease;3:Send Back components to cell 200

message.Title: End Position not achieved
message.Content: 1:Confirm Housing Clips Condition;2:If everything is ok, Send Back to cell 600;3:if damage detected Move to next step;4:Remove Housing Cover;5:Remove Main PCB;6:Send back to cell 500

message.Title: End Position not achieved
message.Content: 1:Confirm Illumination Cover Clips Condition;2:If everything is ok, Send Back to cell 600;3:if damage detected Move to next step;4:Scrap Shifter and recover parts

message.Title: NOK Screuwing
message.Content: 1:Take out the screwing unit;2:Send back to cell 600

message.Title: Part missing
message.Content: 1.-Remove cover, connector and PCB;send WPC to Cell 500 for the assembly of the cover

message.Title: Part missing
message.Content: 1.-Remove sub-assembly illumination cover; send WPC to Cell 500 for the assembly of the cover

message.Title: Knob Checker Failure
message.Content: Put the Knob in the correct position for EOL;Press Release button after correction action

message.Title: Recipe Not Found
message.Content: Verify the settings of the Cell 901;modify the information of the pallet if needed;Press Release button after correction action

message.Title: RFID Error
message.Content: Verify the RFID tag and RFID scanner on cell 901;Press Release button after correction action

message.Title: Part missing in pallet
message.Content: Sensor not detect part in pallet;Scrap the Pallet;Press Release button after correction action

message.Title: Error pallet type
message.Content: Gripper and/or Tools incorrect for this variant on cell 901;Press Release button after correction action

message.Title: Error Data pallet
message.Content: Variant or serial number empty;Call the supervisor to check failure on cell 901;Press Release button after correction action
